amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to transfer $300,000 from the consolidated Farm Service Agency to the account of the Chief Economist of the USDA. \ As amended by the Skeen substitute amendment (A006), the above was replaced with language that transfers $200,000 from the Competitive Research Grants Program to the Office of the Chief Economist of the USDA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to reduce funding for the Consolidated Farm Service Agency salaries and expenses account by $300,000 and to transfer those funds to the account of the Chief Economist of the USDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Condit amendment (A005) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
